definitions.definition: A person who secretly watches and examines the actions of other individuals or organizations and gathers information on them (usually to gain an advantage).

definitions.example: During the Cold War, Russia and America would each spy on each other for recon.

definitions.definition: To spot; to catch sight of.
definitions.example: I think I can spy that hot guy coming over here.

definitions.definition: To explore; to see; to view; inspect and examine secretly, as a country.
